alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenwood County through 400 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamilton, or 11 miles south of Madison, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton and Virgil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
